item.title: OIN explained
item.description: Okta Integration Network (OIN) explained Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Overview of the OIN Why is this here?: In the OIN Internal Workshop, a question was raised: “What do developers need to know about the OIN?” Comments included: What is OIN? General, “What is OIN” Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.

item.title: ISV defined
item.description: ISV defined Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Overview of an ISV and how the fit into the OIN Why is this here?: In the GroupIt Data, ISV was the number 1 most not understood topic. Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.

item.title: Why publish
item.description: Why publish Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Lists reasons why people should care about publishing on the OIN Why is this here?: In the OIN Internal Workshop, a question was raised: “What do developers need to know about the OIN?” Comments included: Why OIN? What is the OIN Value prop? What are the benefits of partnering with the OIN?

item.title: Using Oktas APIs
item.description: Using Okta’s APIs Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Need more clarification on the content. Ask PMs for more details and we’ll need to do more user research. Why is this here?: - Oktane user research: - When asked what do integrators need to know: - APIs and capabilities to support custom work - API Internal workshops: When asked what do developers need to know about the OIN, respondents answered OIN vs API Services APIs requirements Oktane 2024 - Need more research on specifics: https://docs.

item.title: OIN Manager overview
item.description: OIN Manager: an essential overview Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Overview of the OIN manager Why is this here?: At the Oktane MatchIt game, 40% of respondents could not properly define OIN Manager. Structure type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic.Â For example, there are product \ feature overviews:

item.title: Best practices
item.description: Best practices Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: OIN best practices. Why is this here?: - At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Best practices and use cases Best security practices for the app specific guidelines for each app Internal Workshop: When asked “What prevents devs from being successful on the OIN, respondents answered: Best practices for Multi-tenancy Structure type: Concept

item.title: Use cases
item.description: Use cases Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Why is this here?: - At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: - Best practices and use cases - Docs on use case scenarios - Use cases - Use case flows Use cases were consistently the most sought after docs
